description:
What are the differences between Objective-C and Swift? Do you want to create your first Swift application from scratch? This course is perfect for you!

In this course, you'll get the full source code of a Flappy Bird style game in Objective-C and Swift. The best way for you to understand how it works, and what are the real differences with the 2 languages.

You'll need around 45 min to listen the whole course, but believe me, it's around hours of work saved when you'll listen it.

We first decided to show the differences between the languages. In a second part, we decided to show how to build your first app with Swift from scratch step by step.
title: Learn Swift: Develop an App or a Game from the Source Code
